job_tasks.phrase: gain insider knowledge about how automation/robotic engineering influences JDE Peet's landscape and business structure
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of how technical automation impacts the business and its structure.

job_tasks.phrase: gain valuable insights into the process of creating and maintaining robots/automations and how this plays an important role in global and international business structures
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the connection between automation processes and their significance in business operations.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with business leaders and obtain clear requirements
job_tasks.justification: Directly relates to understanding business needs and translating them into technical requirements.

job_tasks.phrase: Fix issues in robots (using UiPath codeing, AI and Machine learning, GenAI and Natural language processing)
job_tasks.justification: This involves working with AI, Machine Learning, GenAI, and NLP, which are core to modeling tasks in a generative context.

job_tasks.phrase: Fix issues in robots (using UiPath codeing, AI and Machine learning, GenAI and Natural language processing)
job_tasks.justification: Fixing issues in existing robotic systems and working with programming/frameworks like UiPath falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with AMS team to develop and deploy automations
job_tasks.justification: Developing and deploying automations is a key software development and operational task.
Daily monitoring of operational systems is a core aspect of operations engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with AMS team to develop and deploy automations
job_tasks.justification: Deploying automations with an operations team points to MLOps responsibilities.

soft_skills.phrase: gain valuable insights into the process of creating and maintaining robots/automations
learn from the best Automation professionals out there!

classification.rationale: The role involves working with AI, GenAI, and NLP, but primarily within the context of Robotic Process Automation (RPA) and its operational aspects using UiPath. It lacks the focus on building and fine-tuning generative models themselves, or developing complex LLM-based applications, which are hallmarks of a GenAI Engineer.
